documents.title: AutoStream Product Overview
documents.content: AutoStream is a SaaS product that provides automated video editing tools for content creators. Our platform uses AI to help YouTubers, Instagram creators, TikTok influencers, and other content creators edit their videos faster and more professionally. AutoStream automates repetitive editing tasks, adds AI-generated captions, applies professional transitions, and optimizes videos for different social media platforms.

documents.title: AutoStream Pricing Plans
documents.content:
AutoStream offers two pricing plans:

Basic Plan - $29 per month
- 10 videos per month
- 720p resolution output
- Basic AI editing features
- Standard transitions and effects
- Email support

Pro Plan - $79 per month
- Unlimited videos per month
- 4K resolution output
- Advanced AI editing features
- AI-powered automatic captions
- Premium transitions and effects
- Priority rendering
- 24/7 support available

Both plans include cloud storage for your projects and access to our template library.

documents.title: AutoStream Features
documents.content:
AutoStream provides powerful features for content creators:

AI-Powered Editing: Automatically cuts silent parts, adds b-roll suggestions, and optimizes pacing.
Smart Captions: AI generates accurate captions and subtitles (Pro plan only).
Multi-Platform Export: Optimize videos for YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook with one click.
Template Library: Access hundreds of professional video templates.
Brand Kit: Save your colors, fonts, and logos for consistent branding.
Collaboration: Share projects with team members and clients.
Cloud Rendering: Fast rendering in the cloud, no need for powerful local hardware.

documents.title: Company Policies
documents.content:
AutoStream Company Policies:

Refund Policy: No refunds are provided after 7 days of purchase. Within the first 7 days, you can request a full refund if you're not satisfied with the service.

Support Availability:
- Basic Plan users receive email support during business hours (9 AM - 6 PM EST, Monday-Friday)
- Pro Plan users get 24/7 support via email, chat, and priority phone support

Free Trial: We offer a 14-day free trial with access to Basic Plan features. No credit card required.

Cancellation: You can cancel your subscription anytime. Access continues until the end of your billing period.

Data Privacy: Your video content is encrypted and never shared. We are GDPR compliant.

documents.title: Getting Started with AutoStream
documents.content:
Getting started with AutoStream is simple:

1. Sign up for a free 14-day trial at autostream.io
2. Upload your first video or choose a template
3. Let our AI analyze and suggest edits
4. Customize with our intuitive editor
5. Export in your preferred format and resolution

Perfect for YouTube creators, Instagram influencers, TikTok content creators, podcast editors, marketing teams, and anyone who creates video content regularly.

Most users create their first professional video in under 30 minutes.

documents.title: AutoStream Use Cases
documents.content:
AutoStream is perfect for various content creator needs:

YouTube Creators: Edit vlogs, tutorials, reviews with AI-powered cuts and transitions.
Instagram Creators: Create Reels and Stories with trending effects and captions.
TikTok Influencers: Quick edits optimized for vertical video and trending sounds.
Podcast Editors: Convert audio podcasts to video format with waveforms and captions.
Business Content: Create product demos, testimonials, and marketing videos.
Education: Make engaging educational content and online courses.

Our AI learns your editing style and gets better over time, saving you hours of manual work.
